title: visual.c.sharp.2008.ebook_darksyde12
description:
The aim of this book is to teach you the fundamentals of programming with C# by using Visual Studio 2008 and the .NET Framework version 3.5. You will learn the features of the C# language, and the use them to build applications ruunong on the Microsoft Windows operating system. By the time you complete this book, you will have a thorough understanding of C3 and will have used it to build Windows presentation foundation (WPF) applications, access Microsoft SQL Server databases, develop ASP.NET Web applications, and build and consume a Windows Communication Foundation service.


Hope you will enjoy!


Visual C # 2008 Step By Step + Book's Code Samples (Companion  CD)
